text: Bytča () is a town in northwestern Slovakia. It is on the Váh river near the cities of Žilina and Považská Bystrica. It is part of the Upper Váh region of tourism. The town was first mentioned in 1234 as terra Bycha. == Twin towns – Sister cities == Bytča is twinned with: * Karolinka, Czech Republic * Opoczno, Poland == Other websites == * Official municipal website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Žilina Region
title: Bytča
